PersonalStatement.text: Ashley Gonzalez, born on 1966-09-28, is a Male based in Maryfort, Rwanda. He is Married and holds Peruvian nationality. Currently working at Kemp Ltd.

WorkExperience.text: Data Analyst at Richardson-Curtis from 2011 to 2020.
Senior HR Manager at Kemp Ltd, 2018 to present.

EducationAndTraining.text: PhD in Computer Science from Universitas Pendidikan Indonesia
Master's in Engineering from Kyung Hee University

PersonalSkills.text: Problem-solving: Skilled in troubleshooting and optimizing complex systems.
Technical Proficiency: Expert in cloud computing and distributed systems.

Hobbies.text: In their free time, he enjoys running marathons.
